1:
Yahweh, you have showed favor to your land;\q you have restored the well-being of Jacob.
\q
2:
You have forgiven the sin of your people;\q you have covered all their sin.
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
3:
You have withdrawn all your wrath;\q you have turned back from your hot anger.
\q
4:
Restore us, God of our salvation,\q and let go of your displeasure with us.
\q
5:
Will you be angry with us forever?\q Will you remain angry throughout future generations?


\q
6:
Will you not revive us again?\q Then your people will rejoice in you.
\q
7:
Show us your covenant faithfulness, Yahweh,\q grant us your salvation.


\q
8:
I will listen to what Yahweh God says,\q for he will make peace with his people, his faithful followers.
\q Yet they must not turn again to foolish ways.
\q
9:
Surely his salvation is near to those who fear him;\q then glory will remain in our land.


\q
10:
Covenant faithfulness and trustworthiness have met together;\q righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
\q
11:
Trustworthiness springs up from the ground,\q and righteousness looks down from the sky.


\q
12:
Yes, Yahweh will give his good blessings,\q and our land will yield its crops.
\q
13: Righteousness will go before him\q and make a way for his footsteps.
